message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $160 for it.
I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $170.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for it.
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, and I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $152 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $162.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
